actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to take certain action in connection with the outporting of certain vessels.

summary.text: Declares that if, before October 1, 1992, the Secretary of Transportation outports a vessel assigned to the Ready Reserve Force in a place other than the place the vessel was outported on August 1, 1990, the Secretary shall replace the vessel with a Reserve Force vessel that is on a 10- or 20-day activation schedule.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Transportation to take certain action in connection with the outporting of certain vessels.
